ActorTalk: It's me. I'm right here. Are you okay, Commandant?
I'm alright... just need a moment. Must've been out for a while.
Alright. Let me help you sit up.
While you were unconscious, it looked like you were having a nightmare.
You kept frowning and saying my name over and over.
I thought, maybe this could help you feel a little better, so I—
The last thing I remember is... the Dreamweaver world.
Right. The loop... are we still—
